definition: to arrange/to exhibit/to move to and fro/a pendulum
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God

sentences.english: If no overcapacity, it is clear that it is disgreeing with MIIT.

sentences.english: I'm trying to win over a little girl who clearly doesn't want a new mother.
sentences.chinese: 我正在嘗試贏得一個擺明不想要後媽的小女孩的心。
